me.bhop.bjdautilities.command.annotation

Annotation Type Command


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Command
    The base command annotation, this must be attached to a class for it to be loadable as a command. In addition, the command must have at least an Execute method and optionally a Usage method. When it comes to basic parameters for each method, the CommandTemplate can be referenced. The command label may be defined in either the value or label property. The first defined label (with value taking priority over label) will be used as the 'official' name in areas such as the generated HelpCommand.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<?>[] children
      The children of this command.
      java.lang.String description
      A short description of the functionality of the command.
      boolean hideInHelp
      Whether or not to hide this command from the generated help menu.
      java.lang.String[] label
      Multiple possible labels for the command.
      int minArgs
      The minimum number of arguments which are required for this command to be executed.
      net.dv8tion.jda.core.Permission[] permission
      One or more permissions to be checked for this command.
      java.lang.String usage
      The usage of the command.
      java.lang.String value
      One potential label slot for the command.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.String value
        One potential label slot for the command. This property will take priority over label if both are supplied.
        Returns:
        one potential label
        Default:
        ""

      • label

        public abstract java.lang.String[] label
        Multiple possible labels for the command. If value is not defined, the first supplied element will be used as the 'official' name.
        Returns:
        one or more potential labels
        Default:
        {}

      • usage

        public abstract java.lang.String usage
        The usage of the command. This should be without the prefix. It will be added in any case that the prefix is displayed by these classes.
        Returns:
        the usage of the command
        Default:
        ""

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        A short description of the functionality of the command.
        Returns:
        the description of the command
        Default:
        ""

      • permission

        public abstract net.dv8tion.jda.core.Permission[] permission
        One or more permissions to be checked for this command. The supplied permissions are configured in an AND format meaning that the sender must have all of the permissions in order to execute the command.
        Returns:
        the permissions required for the command
        Default:
        net.dv8tion.jda.core.Permission.UNKNOWN

      • minArgs

        public abstract int minArgs
        The minimum number of arguments which are required for this command to be executed. Setting this value ensures that the execute method will be given at least the given number of arguments. If the command has optional arguments, they should be excluded from this count because attempted executions without enough arguments will not make it to the execute method.
        Returns:
        the minimum arguments for the command
        Default:
        0

      • children

        public abstract java.lang.Class<?>[] children
        The children of this command. More information on this system can be found in the CommandHandler.
        Returns:
        the children of this command.
        Default:
        java.lang.Void.class

      • hideInHelp

        public abstract boolean hideInHelp
        Whether or not to hide this command from the generated help menu. If the help command is disabled, this option will be ignored.
        Returns:
        if this command is hidden from the help command.
        Default:
        false
